definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

pinyin: ju1 min2 xiao1 fei4 jia4 ge2 zhi3 shu4

definition: variant of 居民點|居民点[ju1 min2 dian3]
permanent resident/person with the right to live in a country or territory

sentences.english: We will accelerate the improvement of the social security system that covers both urban and rural residents.
sentences.chinese: 加快健全覆蓋城鄉居民的社會保障體系。

sentences.english: Nearly half of all ger dwellers live below the poverty line.
sentences.chinese: 將近一半的蒙古包居民的生活水平處於貧困線以下。

sentences.english: Kenai residents know firsthand the challenges that follow a natural disaster.
sentences.chinese: 肯奈居民從親身經驗知道天災之後出現的困難。

sentences.english: Anyone who loses his resident identity card shall apply for reissue of a card.
sentences.chinese: 居民身份證丟失的，應當申請補領。

sentences.english: Do you know what the New Englanders thought of this?
sentences.chinese: 您知道新英格蘭居民對此案的看法嗎？

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教會服務，被關押在女修道院。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美國居民無須服用碘片來預防輻射造成的甲狀腺癌症。

sentences.english: The citizens are disgusted with the factory because of the pollution that the factory has caused.
sentences.chinese: 由於這家工廠製造成污染，居民們對它極爲討厭。

sentences.english: Descended in part from Inca colonists sent here more than 500 years ago, the inhabitants of Taquile keep the old ways.
sentences.chinese: 部分居民是五百年前殖民者的後裔。

sentences.english: Rugao is a city which is famous for its residents' longevity.
sentences.chinese: 如皋，是一個因其居民長壽而聞名的地級市。

sentences.english: I'm a resident of Rose Park on St. Johnson Street.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個居住在聖約翰遜街玫瑰花園的居民。

sentences.english: They now outnumber humans in New Zealand by a ratio of 12 to 1.
sentences.chinese: 現在新西蘭的綿羊和居民的數目比率是12比1。

sentences.english: Residents of many major urban areas complain of 20-hour-long daily blackouts.
sentences.chinese: 很多大城市的居民抱怨每天斷電時間長達20小時。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: High home prices keep middle-income and upper-income residents here renting.
sentences.chinese: 紐約的高房價讓中高收入的居民也會租房。

definition: to reside/to dwell/to live in a place/resident in
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
ordinary people/the "person in the street"/CL:個|个[ge4]
